Text: Heal the Living (French: Réparer les vivants ) is a 2016 French-Belgian drama film directed by Katell Quillévéré and written by Quillévéré and Gilles Taurand.

Text: Heal the Living:  Based on the novel "Réparer les vivants" ("Mend the Living") by Maylis de Kerangal, "Heal the Living" interweaves three stories connected to each other via an organ transplant.

Text: Heal the Living:  The film was presented in the Horizons section at the 73rd Venice International Film Festival.
